content.raw: For the tunnel circuit anyway I believe it was 418 \([#!/osrf/subt/issues/191/expected-nvidia-driver-compatability](#!/osrf/subt/issues/191/expected-nvidia-driver-compatability)\). I’m still using 418 and it seems to still be running without issue. Maybe Nvidia’s backwards compatibility is better than I thought :\). I always seem to have terrible luck with Nvidia drivers though. Good to know that 435 is working.
